programme.title: Sunny Side Up

programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: After Carrot finds out that Jet, Sydney, Sean, Sunspot, and Mindy have been planning a surprise circus-themed party for his birthday, he joins in the circus fun... but ends up straining his back while attempting a high-flipping trick. He figures that he's just getting older and can't do the tricks he used to, back on Bortron 7. But really, it's the fact that Earth's gravity is stronger and keeps them more grounded.
